thread.title: Went for an overnighter to a quarterly evening meeting
thread.title_full: Went for an overnighter to a quarterly evening meeting - Review of Days Inn London Hyde Park, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Malcolm W
title: Went for an overnighter to a quarterly evening meeting
text:
It is very well situated for Paddington and coming from Gloucestershire that was great only a 5 minutes walk ,single room excellently clean, good continental breakfast and a small bar was available when I got back for a night cap, all staff very pleasant and helpful. Bottom line will stay again.
Room Tip: room at back was very quiet See more room tips
